contents.text: Thank you for calling TaskRabbit, serving San Francisco with over 60,000 vetted Taskers ready to help you.
To book a Tasker for your next job, press 1.
For household and cleaning services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our household and cleaning specialists.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a deep clean of my two-bedroom apartment this Friday morning.
I need to book a deep cleaning service for my apartment.
Provision a Tasker to execute an end-to-end apartment sanitization workflow tomorrow at 9 AM.
I need to schedule a one-time home cleaning for this Friday.
I want to schedule a deep cleaning for my one-bedroom apartment.

contents.text: For furniture assembly and handyman services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our furniture assembly and handyman experts.

navigationGoals: I want to book a Tasker to assemble my new IKEA desk tomorrow afternoon.
I want to schedule a Tasker to assemble furniture and handle minor repairs in my home.
Provision a handyman Tasker to assemble and torque-calibrate my new office furniture this afternoon.
I need help assembling my new bookshelf.
I need to book a Tasker to assemble my new standing desk.

contents.text: For customer support and existing tasks, press 2.
For help with order status and billing inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and order status team.

navigationGoals: I need to check the final charge and start time for my recent cleaning booking.
I need to check a billing charge and order status for my last cleaning task.
Query the API for real-time status and billing reconciliation of my current Tasker session.
I have a question about a recent charge on my TaskRabbit invoice.
I’d like to check the billing details for my last cleaning service.

contents.text: To cancel or modify an existing task, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our task cancellation and modification team.

navigationGoals: Cancel my handyman appointment scheduled for tomorrow afternoon.
I need to cancel my upcoming handyman appointment.
Invoke the modification endpoint to cancel or reschedule my existing Tasker assignment within SLA.
I need to reschedule my furniture assembly appointment.
I need to reschedule my upcoming desk assembly appointment.
